Portal 2 nimmt die St√§rken des Vorg√§ngers auf und feilt an dessen Schw√§chen. Neben den noch heute einzigartigen Szenario und einer stimmigen Atmosph√§re gl√§nzt es auch wieder beim Thema Dialoge/Monologe und f√ºhrt mit Wheatley einen am√ºsanten neuen Charakter ein, der sich gut in die Gesamtszenerie einzubringen wei√ü. Portal 2 ist nicht nur 3-4 Stunden l√§nger als Portal 2, sondern setzt dieses mal auch mehr vermehrt auf Storytelling, was nicht nur dem Spiel zu Gute kommt, sondern auch den Spieler mehr eintauchen l√§sst in die Geschehnisse in und um Aperture Science. Auch beim den R√§tseln tut es einen klasse Job, die vorallem am Ende Hirnschmalz erfordern. Somit ist Portal 2 auch nach all den Jahren ein super Adventuregame, was auch jetzt noch hervorstehen und ein zu beeindrucken wei√ü.

[h1]Portal 2[/h1] 

[b]un juego demasiado bueno, siendo la continuacion del 1, entre ambos forman una buena historia que al final es muy bonito y reflexionante :'), casi me hace llorar al final, de tan buena diversion y distraccion del juego, un puzzle unico jamas encontraras otro como el de esta franquicia, tubo muy buen impacto en mi vida de gamer jaja, todo es perfecto, mi recomendacion es infinita de la saga portal..[/b]

This is the only game that has managed to make me shed a tear. Getting to know the personalities of the unique characters it contains was just wonderful.

An excellent puzzle game, gameplay and story are both excellent, the new puzzles give a whole new experience as compared to the first game. 

Would love it if Valve made a co-op that went more than 2 players, but other than that, the 2 player co-op is great. Played it with a few friends, and sometimes you're either working together, or getting off track and killing each other in obstacles, which kinda makes the game a bit funny.

I did play the PS3 version of this game previously right before I got the PC version. But you should go buy this legendary game anyway.
Sehr geiles Game ist einfach ein must Have!
This Game is legendary, if you're thinking if its worth it, yes it is

Me and my friend both considered each other smart, good friends, and great at gaming... until we played this game. Now we both have critical self-consciousness and suffer from depression. At least we beat it though.

The main story is great and has few bugs. Coop is good for the most part as well. However, local coop with one player with controller and the other with mouse and keyboard is nonfunctional. The controller at some times will control both characters. This needs to be fixed.

This has some amazing online gameplay.

The singleplayer experience is a masterpiece. Thinking with Portals is always a fun time!

Hac√≠a tiempo que no me engachaba tanto a un juego, y eso que me hice de rogar para comprarlo.

Los puzzles est√°n muy bien dise√±ados y solo me he encontrado con un error en todo el juego (y casi podr√≠a decirse que estuve busc√°ndolo).

El nivel de frustraci√≥n es por lo general bajo pero probablemente todos encontremos alguna sala que se nos atasque, aunque probablemente no tardemos mucho en encontrar la soluci√≥n.

Aunque los puzzles sean maravillosos por lo que engancha el juego es por su apasionante historia con giros en el argumento y sus constantes bromas con las que no he podido parar de re√≠r.

Por √∫ltimo todos los escenarios est√°n pensados al detalle y vale mucho la pena pararse a observarlos...

En fin, una obra de arte.

The sequel to what's arguably still my favourite game of all time, this one continues and extends the fun. It's much longer, and adds in some new weaponry, although imo the new weaponry doesn't really add much to the original concept. However, AAA gaming can't really get away with short and sweet and perfect games like the first Portal, so they needed some mechanism to extend the concept.
Overall, it's a lot of fun, and a worthy sequel with a great sense of humour.
